channel.title: [PI] Clan chat capitalizes the first letter of every word - How do I fix this?
channel.description:
At first it wasn't that annoying, but now I want to punch my screen, so do my members.
How do I make it so within clan chat, the first letter of every word isn't capitalized?

item.title: [PI] Clan chat capitalizes the first letter of every word - How do I fix this?
item.dc:creator: @Amayzing Amayzing
item.description:
@Amayzing wrote:

Woopzpkedu:

wats the point changing? doesnt do anything anyway every server has it

It looks a lot better…?

If you’re not here to help, what’s the point in posting? Doesn’t do anything but take up space.

Anyone have a solution?

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Clan chat capitalizes the first letter of every word - How do I fix this?
